author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: فرماید بگو بر خود و ناس رحم نمائید و امر الهی را که مقدّس از جوهر تقدیس است بظنون و اوهام نجسهٴ نالائقه نیالائید
translation: Say: Have mercy on yourselves and on your fellowmen, and suffer not the Cause of God — a Cause which is immeasurably exalted above the inmost essence of sanctity — to be sullied with the stain of your idle fancies, your unseemly and corrupt imaginations.
